title: I love this new lore but one thing tilts me...
body:
The new lore is amazing but i have a question since Freljord event, what happend next? I mean. After Bilgerwater event {{champion:4}}  and {{champion:104}}  went to Piltover but when Piltover event came out they didn´t appear. Same with {{champion:202}}  chased by{{champion:238}}  and {{champion:98}}.

Also talking about Freljord, in theory {{champion:127}} won because the votes/icon but then it stopped, we didn´t know what happened to Freljord, who really won that fight. 

In Shurima, the last chapter is {{champion:75}}  going to farm {{champion:101}}  minions and then we didn´t know what happened. If {{champion:15}} and {{champion:163}} could escape, if {{champion:75}}  gets 5000 charges and oneshots {{champion:101}} ... There´s so many incomplete endings. Like, {{champion:268}}  didn´t appear in the 2ºnd history of Shurima. 

Meanwhile {{champion:161}}  is still chasing for {{champion:26}} .

replies.body:
Lissandra likely did not win the war.
The war of the 3 sisters is pretty much the main storyline of the freljord,it won't just end offscreen because of the votes(heck if it ends,it is likely going to end with the destruction/assimilation of the other 2 main tribes).
In fact they never said that this poll would decide who would win the war.
The war has not ended. Yet.
No offense but did the war even begin? To my knowledge, we got a marriage, Sejuani pissed, and some Lissandra mystery.

I don't know why but the Three-Sisters-War reminds me of the _Skyward Sword_ curse that Ganon places. Like it will go on for Eternity like this; with the tribes always at war and killing each other whether it be by magic, nature, or weapon.

They're setting up the world and the individual locations right now. 
It was a very slow start, but events seem to be coming sooner these days. 
I wouldn't worry too much, it's hard to build a believable world.

> Also talking about Freljord, in theory {{champion:127}} won because the votes/icon but then it stopped, we didn&acute;t know what happened to Freljord, who really won that fight. 

Lissandra did not win, there is still a civil war going on, that event is no longer valid.
I'm sure they do a new Freljord's event.
The question of the century. No one wants to talk about it, But i too feel like nothing has progress really

>The question of the century. No one wants to talk about it, But i too feel like nothing has progress really

Oh come on. You and OP must understand why we still have unresolved stories, no? 

Could you not imagine the kind of backlash had resolving loose ends been attempted before those that still remain without any canon lore? Hyperthetical: had your fav region or champ still gone without any update over these last 3 years but say another had been re-visited more the once already. We would all be whining to Riot about favoritism instead.
Favoritism exist on the boards now. Yet no one whines about it.

>Favoritism exist on the boards now. Yet no one whines about it.

Im not a mind reader and that statement means nothing without context, could you do that please.
